description:
Stay in touch when out of cell range with these powerful FRS walkie talkies. With a broadcast range of over 50 kilometers the ACXT645 FRS radios make staying in contact with your party easy. 22 channels and 121 privacy codes give you lots of options for big groups or specific family members. If you head out early, or watch wildlife, the vibration alert mode keeps noise to a minimum.

  • 56km range (in ideal conditions) gives you range to around camp, on trail or around the cruise ship
  • VOX, voice-activated transmission for hands free communication
  • 22 channels and 121 privacy codes give you 2662 combinations for private conversations or large groups
  • Tri-watch scanning mode monitors up to 3 channels at once
  • 10 channel NOAA weather radios help you stay up to date on current conditions
  • VibrAlert® lets you feel when there are incoming communications or alerts
  • Integrated LED flashlight helps you see and be seen
  • IPX4 waterproofing
  • Rugged housing and rubberized grips
  • Power saver standby mode, keeps it ready to receive or transmit
  • USB charging dock charges 3 AA rechargeable batteries. Common alkaline AA batteries can also be used
  • Includes: 2 ACXT645 2-way radios, 6 x rechargeable AA batteries (3 per radio), charging dock, USB charging cable and manual
name: Cobra ACXT645 56km NOAA FRS Walkie Talkie

specs.value: 3 AA rechargeable (included) or 3 AA alkalines (not included)
